mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_notice (notice_title, notice_content, notice_views, mem_id, notice_category, created_at) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{views}, #{writer}, #{category}, sysdate);
INSERT INTO tbl_freeboard (board_title, board_content, created_at, board_views, board_likes, board_file, mem_id) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, sysdate, #{views}, #{likes}, #{filename}, #{writer});

INSERT INTO tbl_team_board (team_idx, board_category, board_title, board_content, created_at, board_views, board_likes, board_file, mem_id) VALUES (#{team_Num}, #{category}, #{title}, #{content}, sysdate, #{views}, #{likes}, #{filename}, #{writer});
mapper.update: update tbl_notice set notice_category=#{category}, notice_title=#{title}, notice_content=#{content} where mem_id=#{writer} and notice_idx=#{borad_Num}
update tbl_freeboard set board_title=#{title}, board_content=#{content}, board_file=#{filename} where board_idx =#{boardNum} and mem_id=#{writer}
update tbl_team_board set board_title=#{title}, board_content=#{content}, board_file=#{filename} where board_idx =#{boardNum} and mem_id=#{writer}
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_notice where mem_id=#{writer} and notice_idx=#{boardNum} and notice_title=#{title}
delete from tbl_freeboard where mem_id=#{writer} and board_idx=#{boardNum} and board_title=#{title}
delete from tbl_team_board where mem_id=#{writer} and team_idx=#{teamNum} and board_idx=#{boardNum} and board_title=#{title}
